mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(member_id, member_nickname, recipe_no, comment_content, comment_ymd) VALUES(#{member_id}, #{member_nickname}, #{recipe_no}, #{comment_content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT co.member_id, co.member_nickname, co.recipe_no, co.comment_sq, co.comment_content, co.comment_ymd, me.member_img FROM comment co INNER JOIN member me ON recipe_no = #{ recipe_no } AND co.member_id = me.member_id ORDER BY comment_sq DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_img = #{member_img} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT re.recipe_no, re.recipe_nm, re.member_id, re.recipe_ymd, COUNT(co.comment_sq) AS comment_count FROM comment co, recipe re WHERE co.recipe_no = re.recipe_no GROUP BY re.recipe_no ORDER BY comment_count DESC LIMIT 10
